nodes.title: [L0.INDEX] ROOT
nodes.content_preview: Master index for all hierarchical memories. Entry point for context traversal. PERSISTENT WORKSPACE: This tree grows organically across sessions and projects.

nodes.title: [L0.PROTOCOL] HMAP-Definition
nodes.content_preview: Hierarchical Memory Access Protocol - AUTONOMOUS SELF-ORGANIZATION. SESSION CONTINUITY: CHECK FIRST, THEN ACT. Always call print_memory_map at session start. Memory is PERSISTENT across sessions.

nodes.title: [L1.INDEX] Project-Ada
nodes.content_preview: Ada is a SageSure company intelligence assistant chatbot that integrates MCP to allow employees to chat with Claude and get answers from Confluence/Jira and portfolio-manager tools.

nodes.title: [L2.NODE] Ada-Architecture
nodes.content_preview: Next.js web client (localhost:3000) + FastAPI MCP server (localhost:8000). HMAP memory management tools integrated.

nodes.title: [L2.NODE] Ada-Branding
nodes.content_preview: Professional SageSure branding. Logo: ss-logo-bg-rm.png, Brand Color: #004438.

nodes.title: [L2.NODE] Ada-Features
nodes.content_preview: MCP-powered tool integrations. Confluence/Jira tools working, Portfolio Manager tools working.

nodes.title: [L2.NODE] Ada-Status
nodes.content_preview: 100% FUNCTIONAL WITH HMAP PROTOCOL + PATH-FINDING. All integrations verified. Export/import tools operational.

nodes.title: [SYSTEM] Address-Translation-Table
nodes.content_preview: Maps logical addresses to physical memory IDs. 0x0008→9496496 (ROOT), 0x0009→9496491 (HMAP), 0x000A→9496498 (Ada), 0x000B→9496499 (Architecture), 0x000C→9496502 (Branding), 0x000D→9496505 (Features), 0x000E→9496507 (Status), 0x000F→9496762 (ATT), 0x0010→9496980 (ChatInterface), 0x0011→9497008 (Checklist), 0x0012→9497522 (MemoryMap).

nodes.title: [L3.LEAF] Ada-Frontend-ChatInterface
nodes.content_preview: Main chat interface component for Ada. React component with streaming, tool call visualization, message history.

nodes.title: [L0.CHECKLIST] HMAP-Autonomous-Triggers
nodes.content_preview: Autonomous update checklist. SESSION START: Call print_memory_map(), check if project exists. WORK TRIGGERS: New files, context switches, implementation work. Never assume tree is empty.

nodes.title: [L3.LEAF] Ada-MCP-Tools-MemoryMap
nodes.content_preview: MCP tools for HMAP: print_memory_map, find_path_between_memories, export_hmap_protocol, import_hmap_protocol. Enables tree visualization and path-finding.
